definition: Yellow hat or Gelugpa school of Tibetan Buddhism/also written 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]

sentences.english: Prof Yasheng further says that learning Chinese language will be a key to build trust.
sentences.chinese: 黄教授还表示学习中文将是建立信任的关键。

sentences.english: Before he died just know that perennial of what to look for is situated boy.
sentences.chinese: 死前才知道顽童即是黄教所要寻找的灵童。

sentences.english: The class will be reincarnated yellow bransh boy, black teach is becoming youth.
sentences.chinese: 黄教的班祥会投胎成为灵童，黑教则转世为天童。

sentences.english: Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 现在的雍和宫属于黄教的寺庙，香火很旺。

sentences.english: Present at the meeting were Professor Huang and many other guests.
sentences.chinese: 出席会议的有黄教授和许多其他客人。

sentences.english: Professor Huang was very difficult to understand.
sentences.chinese: 黄教授感到非常不理解。

sentences.english: Professor Huang says another issue is the growing wealth gap in China.
sentences.chinese: 黄教授说，另一个问题是中国。

sentences.english: He came from China and received his professional journalism training in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 黄教授曾在北京接受过专业的新闻训练。

sentences.english: It is the greatest and more integrated Yellow Jiao fane in Xin Jiang at present.
sentences.chinese: 新疆目前现存的一座最大的比较完整的黄教寺院。

definition: Geju (Tibetan: transmit word of Buddha) sect of Tibetan Buddhist
Tsongkhapa (1357-1419), Tibetan religious leader, founder of the Gelugpa school 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]
Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century
Ganden monastery, Tibetan: dGa' ldan rNam rgyal gling, Dagzê county 達孜縣|达孜县[Da2 zi1 xian4], Lhasa, Tibet
Panchen (Lama)/abbr. for 班禪額爾德尼|班禅额尔德尼[Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2]
former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan
the Dalai Lama/abbr. of 達賴喇嘛|达赖喇嘛[Da2 lai4 La3 ma5]
Panchen Erdeni or Panchen Lama/abbr. to 班禪|班禅[Ban1 chan2]
pinyin: Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2

definition: lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
